meanings.definition: For all future time; for always.
meanings.sent1: She promised to love him forevers.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased its tail forevers, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled forevers in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall and strong, its roots reaching forevers into the ground.
